DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect choline fenofibrate regression macular edema eye subject type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) present diabetic macular edema ( DME )
DOC.brief_title: Effect Choline Fenofibrate ( SLV348 ) Macular Edema
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria With DME least one eye subject eye present macula thickness ≥ 300 µm OCT examination baseline least one 5 follow zone : center zone , superior inner zone , nasal inner zone , inferior inner zone , temporal inner zone , confirmed central reading OCT ; When laser treatment safely postpone least 3 month ; With establish T2DM HbA1c < 10 % ; With systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) diastolic blood pressure ( DBP ) < 160/90 mmHg ; With document elevated triglyceride level ( TG > =150 mg/dL [ 1.70 mmol/L ] ) screen visit previous 3 month . Exclusion Criteria Previous laser photocoagulation ; Eye retinal thickening result epiretinal membrane vitreomacular traction ; glaucoma ; Poor visual acuity : visual acuity 20/800
